title: Prepare to be swept away by this spectacular view! Tour today!
posting_body: ➢ Built-In Desks & Shelving in Select Homes
➢ Kitchen Islands in Select Two Bedroom Homes
➢ Spectacular Mountain Views in Select Homes
➢ Upgraded Black & Stainless Steel Appliances in Select Homes
IMT Cornerstar Ranch is comprised of one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment homes located in Aurora, CO.
Each home includes an array of interior amenities from fully equipped gourmet kitchens and garden tubs to in-home washer/dryers and spacious walk-in closets.
Community amenities include a sand volleyball court, a resort-style pool with a lounge and sundeck, and a theater room.
IMT Cornerstar Ranch is pet friendly with an elite dog park with an agility course.
IMT Cornerstar Ranch's prime location is equipped with a variety of restaurant and retail entertainment options with Cornerstar Shopping Center in close proximity.
Just outside their doors, residents have direct entry to the Cherry Creek Valley Ecological Park with miles of walking trails and sweeping views of the Rocky Mountain Front Range.
IMT Cornerstar Ranch also has convenient access to E-470 freeway giving residents an easy commute to the best that the greater Denver area has to offer.
Come home to IMT Cornerstar Ranch.
Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!
➢ Resort-Style Pool & Spa with Poolside Games Lawn, Lounge & Sundeck
➢ Adjacent to Cherry Creek Valley Ecological Park with Miles of Trails & Sweeping Views of the Rocky Mountain Front Range
➢ Convenient Access to E-470, Denver Technological Center, Meridian Business District, Denver International Airport, Fitzsimons, Downtown Denver & Buckley Air Force Base
➢ Direct Access to 42-Mile Cherry Creek Trail
Located in Highly Coveted Cherry Creek School District
➢ My IMT Resident Portal with Online & On-Site Kiosk Access: Utilities Connection, Rent Payment, Service Requests, Account Information & Community Postings
➢ Next to Cornerstar Shopping Center & Arapahoe Crossings, with a Variety of Restaurant, Retail & Entertainment Options
➢ Ten minutes from Park Meadows Mall, Colorado's Largest Indoor Shopping Mall
For one pet, pet fee (non-refundable) is $350 and pet rent is $35 per month.
For two pets, pet fee (non-refundable) is $500 and pet rent is $50 per month.
*Prices are subject to change without notice
